# General

# Brief description

Empty cells in the selected categorical columns will be filled with the given term

# Parameters

## Columns

Selected categorical columns, whose empty cells should be filled with the defined "Value" (default: all categorical columns are selected).

## Value

The empty cells of the selected categorical columns will be filled with the defined value, which has to be typed in the predefined text field (default: empty).
